name: Deathtouch
description: Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.

name: Double Strike
description: This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.

name: Enchant
description: This card can only be attached to a specific type of card or a player.

name: Equip
description: Attach this permanent to target creature you control that matches a quality for the shown cost. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
